soccer.common

Class PeriodData

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.PeriodData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Data

    public class PeriodData
extends java.lang.Object
implements Data
    Set the game simulation cycle, mainly affect the game period.
    Author:
    Yu Zhang with modifications by Vadim Kyrylov January 2006

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      char actionType
      Describes the action by the couch client.
      static char FORWARD
      control token 'f' means to forward the game to the next period.
      static char PLAY
      control token 'p' means to play the game.
      static char SAVE
      control token 'a' means to save a snapshot of the game.
      static char STEP
      control token 's' means to step forward the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PeriodData()
      Constructs an empty PeriodData for reading from an UDP packet.
      PeriodData(char at)
      Constructs an PeriodData for writeing to an UDP packet.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void readData(java.util.StringTokenizer st)
      Load and parse data content from a string using StringTokenizer.
      void writeData(java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
      Stream its data content to a string using defined data format.
